ai_flow_plugins.blob_manager_plugins package¶

Submodules¶

ai_flow_plugins.blob_manager_plugins.local_blob_manager module¶

class ai_flow_plugins.blob_manager_plugins.local_blob_manager.LocalBlobManager(config: Dict[str, Any])[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.plugin_interface.blob_manager_interface.BlobManager

LocalBlobManager is an implementation of BlobManager based on the local file system. LocalBlobManager contains 2 configuration items: 1. local_repository: It represents the root path of the downloaded project package.

If local_path is set, local_path is used first.

  1. remote_repository: It represents the root path of the upload project package.

cleanup_project(workflow_snapshot_id, remote_path: str)[source]¶

clean up the project files downloaded or created during this execution. :param workflow_snapshot_id: It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation. :param remote_path: The project package uri.

download_project(workflow_snapshot_id, remote_path: str, local_path: Optional[str] = None) → str[source]¶

download the needed resource from remote blob server to local process for remote execution.

Parameters

  • workflow_snapshot_id – It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation.

  • remote_path – The project package uri.

  • local_path – Download file root path.

:return The local project path.

upload_project(workflow_snapshot_id: str, project_path: str) → str[source]¶

upload a given project to blob server for remote execution.

Parameters

  • workflow_snapshot_id – It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation.

  • project_path – The path of this project.

:return The uri of the uploaded project file in blob server.

ai_flow_plugins.blob_manager_plugins.oss_blob_manager module¶

class ai_flow_plugins.blob_manager_plugins.oss_blob_manager.OssBlobManager(config: Dict[str, Any])[source]¶

Bases: ai_flow.plugin_interface.blob_manager_interface.BlobManager

OssBlobManager is an implementation of BlobManager based on the oss file system OssBlobManager contains configuration items: 1. access_key_id: The oss access key. 2. access_key_secret: The oss access secret. 3. bucket: The oss bucket name. 4. local_repository: It represents the root path of the downloaded project package.

download_project(workflow_snapshot_id, remote_path: str, local_path: Optional[str] = None) → str[source]¶

download the needed resource from remote blob server to local process for remote execution.

Parameters

  • workflow_snapshot_id – It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation.

  • remote_path – The project package uri.

  • local_path – Download file root path.

:return The local project path.

upload_project(workflow_snapshot_id: str, project_path: str) → str[source]¶

upload a given project to blob server for remote execution.

Parameters

  • workflow_snapshot_id – It is the unique identifier for each workflow generation.

  • project_path – The path of this project.

:return The uri of the uploaded project file in blob server.
